script_id.description: The identifier of the script to identify

task_description.description: A short description of the task

timeout.description: The maximum time, in seconds, the execution should be processed in (default: 300s)

settings.description: The settings to forward the remote script

inputParams.description: The arguments for the remote script

password.description: The password to encrypt the result (for cloud destination)

outputDirectory.description: The destination directory for the result (for local destination)

scriptRuntimeTimeoutSeconds.description: The maximum time, in seconds, the remote script should run (default: same value than timeout)

filters.description: Filters to select the agents that will run the remote script

ids.description: The list of Agent IDs to filter by

account_ids.description: The list of Account IDs to filter by

group_ids.description: The list of network group to filter by

site_ids.description: The list of Site IDs to filter by

description: Execute a remote script and get the results
name: Execute a remote script

result_file.description: The url to download the result (for cloud destination)

download_url.description: The url to download the result
